body: An urban druid can channel stored spell energy into domain spells that she has not prepared ahead of time. She can “lose” a prepared spell in order to cast any domain spell of the same level or lower. This ability replaces the ability to spontaneously cast summon nature's ally spells.
name: Spontaneous Casting
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Urban Druid/Spontaneous Casting
